title: IS_VEHICLE_RADIO_ON
content:
0x0BE4BE946463F917// IsVehicleRadioOn
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_RADIO_ON(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to checkReturns: Returns true if the given vehicle's radio onOld name:  _IS_VEHICLE_RADIO_ENABLEDExamples:LuaC#local radioEnabled = IsVehicleRadioEnabled(GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false))
print(radioEnabled)
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for IS_VEHICLE_RADIO_ON
IsVehicleRadioOn(vehicle)
